page.title: 17TRANSPORT IN UPWEY
page.content: UPWEY,BEING MOSTLY COVERED BY FARMING LAND, HAS ONLY ONE OR TWO MAIN ROADWAYS. HOWEVER THE MOST IMPORTANT OF THESE IS THE MAIN ROAD IN AND OUT OF THE HOLIDAY TOWN OF WEYMOUTH. TO INVESTIGATE JUST HOW BUSY THIS ROAD IS A{TRAFFIC SURVEY}WAS CARRIED OUT IN THE FOLLOWING WAY: THE SURVEY BEGAN AT 9.15 AM AND LASTED FOR{2 HOURS ON JULY 4TH 1985.} THE NUMBERS OF COMMERCIAL VEHICLES,PUBLIC TRANSPORT,AND PRIVATE VEHICLES WERE COUNTED DURING THIS TIME.SOME DISTINCTION BETWEEN LOCALS AND HOLIDAY MAKERS WAS MADE BY RECORDING THE LAST 2 REGISTRATION LETTERS(LJ,EL,PR,FX,JT,RU BEING LOCAL NUMBERS). {THE RESULTS OF THE SURVEY CAN BE}FOUND {ON THE NEXT PAGE.}
